import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Card.css"; export default function Card({ temp, min, max, name, country, img, onClose, id, timezone }) { return (
{name}, {country}
{/*
{timezone}
{Date.UTC()+timezone}
*/}
{temp}°C
{/*
{temp}

Temp

{max}°

*/}

Min

{min}°

Max

{max}°

); }
